page.title: 16Transport
page.content:
The main road feature in the area is the new{M56 motorway.}This allows easy access to{Chester}and the{Wirral}to west and{Manchester}to the east. In addition the motorway links up with the{M6}allowing easy access to the rest of Britain. Fortunately the motorway is in{cutting}as it goes through the village so the problem of {noise}is not a great one.
Three{bus services}go through the area. The{C30}from{Warrington}to {Chester}(see page 1), the{144}from {Runcorn}to{Northwich}(via{Dutton)}and a local service from{Runcorn}to the {Whitehouse}industrial estate (on a special road only for buses called the {'Busway').
To-day the{canal}is only used for pleasure. There is a near-by{marina.
